Description of incident: On Monday, December 18, 2017, Santa Cruz Biotechnology, Inc. discovered a burglary had occurred in the Santa Cruz office on or around December 17, 2017. As a result of an investigation, they determined that two computers were stolen, both of which were used for HR functions, one of which contained information on consumers, including their full name, postal address, date of birth, social security number, and medical and health insurance information.
